channel.title: Project 2006
channel.description:
[img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/project%202006/Untitled.png[/img]
Fixes as of 6/30/2012
[ul][li]Trade glitches.[/li] [li]Trees all around the world cuttable.[/li] [li]Added all npc's in the correct places through out the world.[/li] [li]Fixes combat bugs and dupes.[/li][/ul]
[b]The color Red means it hasn't been started. The color Orange means it has been start but not complete. The color Green means its complete. [/b]
[b]Combat[/b] All special attacks Clipping Correct timers Equipment effects (barrows) PvN PvP Weapon degrading (barrows)
[b]Mage[/b] Ancient spells Dust Ice Shadow Smoke Teleports Clipping Modern spells Alches Basic combat spells Binding spells Bones to bananas Bones to peaches Charge Curses Enchanting jewelery God spells Iban blast Slayer dart Teleblock Teleports Staffs giving unlimited runes
[b]Range[/b] All special attacks Clipping Crystal bow Dwarf cannon Throwables
[b]Prayer[/b] All prayers Bone burying Ectofuntus Prayer draining
[b]Agility[/b] All obstacles Finish the course to get xp Correct emotes
[b]Cooking[/b] Brewing Cakes Cooking gauntlets Correct burn chance Fish Meat Miscellaneous Stews Pies Pizzaz Potato Toppings Vegetables Wine
[b]Crafting[/b] Dragonleather crafting Leather crafting Mould smelting Stringing amulets Weaving Tanning
[b]Farming[/b] Allotments Amulet of Nature Bushes Compost bin Flowers Herbs Hops Fruit trees Protecting crops Specials Tool leprechauns Trees
[b]Firemaking[/b] All logs Can't light fires in banks Can't light fires on objects Clipping Colored fires Fires burn out and leave ashes
[b]Fishing[/b] All fish can be caught Bait checking Equipment checking Moving fishing spots Whirlpools Correct Emotes
[b]Fletching[/b] Arrow making Bow making Darts
[b]Herblore[/b] All potions Grinding materials Pouring together doses Weapon poisoning
[b]Mining[/b] All ores All pickaxes Gems Prospecting Rock golem Rocks deplete and regenerate
[b]Runecrafting[/b] Abyss All runes can be made Entering altars Multiple runes Talisman location finding Tiara making Tiaras give the enter option on mysterious ruins
[b]Slayer[/b] All slayer masters All slayer monsters working correctly All task level difficulties
[b]Smithing[/b] Adamant Blurite Bronze Elemental Iron Mithril Rune Smelting Steel
[b]Thieving[/b] Blackjacking Correct caught chance Disarming traps Picking locks Pickpocketing Stalls
[b]Woodcutting[/b] All axes All trees cuttable Bird nests Stumps with respawning Tree spirit
[b]Quests[/b] Tutorial Island Black Knight's Fortress Cook's Assistant Demon Slayer Doric's Quest Dragon Slayer Ernest the Chicken Goblin Diplomacy Imp Catcher The Knights Sword Pirate's Treasure Prince Ali Rescue The Restless Ghost Romeo & Juliet Rune Mysteries Sheep Shearer Shield of Arrav Vampire Slayer Witch's Potion
[b]Minigames[/b] Barrows Duel Arena Fight Caves Fight Pits Fishing Trawler Gnome Glider Party Room Warriors Guild Zombie Waves Pest Control Pyramid Plunder Treasure Trails
[size=36pt][b]Pictures:[/b][/size] [img]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc377/jake56133/project%202006/wc.png[/img]

item.title: Project 2006
item.dc:creator: @drew56133 drew56133
item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:7, topic:447534"][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=550430.msg4034754#msg4034754 date=1341095299]
Another fail remake…hmmmmmm… 10 rep… also there is already a server called ‘project 2006’.
Also is fire-making clipped?
[/quote]

Since when has reputation been the epitome of knowledge?

@OP
Your stumps are wrong.[/quote]As you can see its still in development. Thats whats this section is for. As of last night i fixed the stumps.

Read full topic

item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

Fixes as of 6/30/2012

[ul][li]Trade glitches.[/li]
[li]Trees all around the world cuttable.[/li]
[li]Added all npc’s in the correct places through out the world.[/li]
[li]Fixes combat bugs and dupes.[/li][/ul]

The color Orange means it has been start but not complete.
The color Green means its complete.
